6.81: Reduced  Kinetic Field cooldown from 14 to 14/13/12/11.
6.83: Glimpse Rescaled manacost from 160/130/100/70 to 100 on each level. Reduced cooldown from 65/50/35/20 to 60/46/32/18. Reduced  Kinetic Field cooldown from 14/13/12/11 to 13/12/11/10. Rescaled  Static Storm cooldown from 85 on each level to 90/80/70.
6.84: Kinetic Field and  Static Storm no longer ignores ancient creeps, Roshan and creep-heroes. Increased  Kinetic Field duration from 2.5/3/3.5/4 to 2.6/3.2/3.8/4.4
6.78: Thunder Strike Increased number of strikes from 3 to 4 (interval is still the same). This increases the overall duration from 4 to 6 seconds. Reduced damage per strike from 50/75/100/125 to 40/60/80/100. Increased damage radius from 200 to 240.
6.75: Force Staff can no longer push units through  Kinetic Field. Increased  Static Storm maximum damage per second from 170/210/250 to 170/220/270.
6.69: Increased  Static Storm cooldown from 60 to 75.
6.71: Increased  Static Storm cooldown from 75 to 85.
6.70: Increased  Thunder Strike manacost form 100/110/120/130 to 130 on each level.
6.79: Reduced  Glimpse cooldown from 60/50/40/30 to 65/50/35/20. Increased  Kinetic Field radius from 300 to 325.  Static Storm Increased radius from 375 to 450. Increased maximum damage per second from 170/220/270 to 200/250/300. Added  Aghanim's Scepter upgrade for Disruptor: Increases  Static Storm duration from 5 to 7, increases maximum damage per second from 200/250/300 to 280/350/420 and causes it to mute items.
